House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00548
FULL TITLE : AN ACT IMPOSING THE COMPLETION OF THE REQUIREMENTS OF THE CONTINUING PROFESSIONAL EDUCATION (CPE) PROGRAMS ADOPTED BY PROFESSIONAL REGULATORY BOARDS AS A MANDATORY REQUIREMENT FOR THE RENEWAL OF PROFESSIONAL LICENSES
ABSTRACT : Restores the Continuing Professional Education (CPE) requirement as a condition for the renewal of professional licenses. Repeals Section 20 of R.A. No. 8981, the PRC Modernization Act of 2000.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ESCUDERO, EVELINA G.
